TopicTitle: Fuel Lines Broken in New Version (0.17)? And how to get to cockpit?

Articles.Content:
Two things:

* The attached craft (Stubby) is exceedingly simple. Why don't the fuel lines feed fuel from the central tanks to the engines around the perimeter of the booster? This kind of thing worked in 0.16.

* What do I do to access internal cockpit views?

Thanks for your time.

EDIT: Okay, I figured out that switching to internal view is as simple as switching cameras (<C>). But the fuel line question still has me stumped. Does anyone have insight into the problem?

Edited September 21, 2012 by Nikolai
Figured out cockpit view

They are working, you put them on backwards! =>

Look at the little black arrows on them, you will see they are pointing UP on the outside fuel lines, and down on your other ones..

So you are sending fuel from your outside tanks to your inside tanks.

Click first at the tank you want to drain from, then click at the tank you want to send to..
